name: rule_Loans_01
pattern: systemId == ""land"", moduleId == ""LOANS"", accountingEventType == ""ACCR"", dealType ==""LNCP"",reverse == false, multiOffset == false, currencyCode == ""INR""
result: creditCurrencyCode=input.currencyCode, debitValueDate=input.valueDate, creditValueDate=input.valueDate, debitAmount=input.eventAmount, creditAmount=input.eventAmount, debitLocalAmount=input.eventAmount, creditLocalAmount=input.eventAmount, narrative=""Interest Accrual customer Id=""+input.customerId+"",loan Contract Number=""+input.loanContractNumber+"",loan Account Number=""+input.loanAccountNumber+"",calculation period=""+input.startInterestAccrual+""-""+input.endInterestAccrual, postingDescription=""Interest Accrual"", ruleName=rule.name
